proposals be sent to him for his staff's reaction. Originally, I was
thinking of a proposal dealing with a summer activity here at KTCA-TV.
However, in my reply I had intended to include the information about
the N.A.E.B. Utilization Kit Proposal. After working on the draft of
this letter to McPherson, I thought I had better check with you before
sending any information to him. Perhaps you have better channels to
the U.S. Office of Education than this. It might be inappropriate to
send any information other than what might come from Headquarters â€¢ I
will hold this letter to McPherson until I hear from you.
